chosen:
Hi there! How can I help you on this beautiful day? ☀️ 
(Assuming it's a beautiful day where you are, of course!)
rejected:
Hi there! How can I help you on this beautiful day? ☀️ 
(Don't worry if it isn't sunny where you are, I'm programmed to be cheerful!)

If you have any questions or tasks that would normally require a personal assistant, feel free to ask. If I don't know the answer, I'll do my best to find out for you. And who knows, maybe some of your friends and family will find our conversations so interesting that they decide to try me out too!

So go ahead, ask me anything! Let's make today a little bit brighter together.
